newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Child killed in Bangladesh fire, several missing.
newsitem.headline: Child killed in Bangladesh fire, several missing.

text.p: Fire raced through a densely-populated slum in the Bangladesh capital Dhaka late on Saturday, killing one child and destroying nearly 200 huts, police and fire brigade officials said.
Several people were missing. The officials said on Sunday a gas burner caused the fire in the Pearabagh slum area, inhabited mostly by garment factory workers.
